```{python}

with open("conlang.txt", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    text = f.read()

# Preview first 8000 characters
print(text[:8000])

```

```{python}
import re

# Normalize text: convert to lowercase
text_lower = text.lower()

# Split text using regex (\W+ matches any sequence of non-word characters)
words_all = re.split(r'\W+', text_lower)

# Remove any blank strings
words_all = [w for w in words_all if w]

# Verify: show the first 15 words
words_all[:15]

```

```{python}
vowels = set("aeiouꞫɜʔ")  

words_v = []      # words that contain at least one vowel
words_no_v = []   # words that contain no vowels

for wd in words_all:
    if any(ch in vowels for ch in wd):
        words_v.append(wd)
    else:
        words_no_v.append(wd)

print("First 15 words with vowels:", words_v[:15])
print("First 15 words without vowels:", words_no_v[:15])
```

```{python}
print("First 30 words (with vowels):")
print(words_v[:30])
print()

print("Counts:")
print("  total tokens after edge-punct clean:", len(words_all))
print("  kept (has ≥1 vowel):", len(words_v))
print("  removed (no vowels):", len(words_no_v))
```
